This isn't Uncharted Zombies Part 2.If you want a sequel to be like the previous (admittably amazing) installment\, play Uncharted. If you want the same game but new\, play Halo or Call of Duty. But if you're looking for a new experience\, a different take on your usual story\, then much like the first The Last Of Us\, this is the game for you.Don't expect to love it like you did the first one\, it's a different game. The former is a simple story. Yes it was amazingly written\, directed and visualised but it didn't require much thought.This one\, however\, isn't simple.
